OrgName: Global Education Technologies, Inc. dba Letterbanc
activities: Letterbanc is a web-based academic and professional network and intermediary for submitting scholarships, internships, and job applications. In order to intermediate such applications, Letterbanc users create profile accounts using personal identifying information. Additionally, Letterbanc stores application materials such as resumes, CVs, transcripts, cover letters, and third-party recommendation letters.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: No client data is manually processed.  Client personal data (personal information and documents) is stored in profile accounts for transmission.
privacyprograms: Better Business Bureau (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Program
